import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import HomeMore from '../HomeMore'; import './index.less'; import { getIndexPartners } from '../../../api/index'; const icon1 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon1.png'); const icon2 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon2.png'); const icon3 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon3.png'); const icon4 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon4.png'); const icon5 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon5.png'); const icon6 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon6.png'); const icon7 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon7.png'); const icon8 = require('../../assets/images/footer-icon8.png'); export default function HomeFooter({ showHuoban, showInfo, partnersSize, }) { const [partners, setPartners] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getIndexPartners({ size: partnersSize }).then(res => { console.log('getIndexPartners'); console.log(res); setPartners(res?.data?.partners || []); }) }, [showHuoban]); return (
